column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Our party of 6 arrived here at about 6:30pm on a Monday evening. We were seated within 10 minutes and the service was great. Our waitress was super friendly and attentive; although she forgot an iced tea and we were still charged for it (no
column2: we didn't think it was worth getting grumpy about because she was otherwise very sweet and accommodating).
